metadata.name: Strange Times
metadata.description:
The piece “Strange Times” from “Sing with Me” project is a reflection of the suppressed voice of the people in my country. A voice that is wholeheartedly seeking Freedom, Justice and Love. A voice that is never going to rest or settle.

Size: 4K resolution

The collector will receive the following:

- 5 ETH: The genesis piece

- 15 ETH: The genesis piece + exclusive access to "strange times" single original audio + 2 VIP concert tickets of Alireza Ghorbani valid worldwide incl. backstage photoshoot

- 45 ETH: The genesis piece + exclusive access to "strange times" single original audio + 2 VIP concert tickets of Alireza Ghorbani valid worldwide for 5 years incl. backstage photoshoot + 1 full day (collector plus 1) with Alireza Ghorbani and team valid worldwide (behind the scenes of concert preparation)
